ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 25 May 1999, Jay Hollums wrote:
> I just obtained 12th level and was wondering if it would be worth it to get
> Al'Kabor's Frost Spiral? I have seen the mana cost at 100! and I have never
> seen a damage code for it.... Any one want to help me on this one? So far
> I have picked up Shock of Lightning, Halo of Light, and Bind Affinity.

I bought it but never used it. I think it does up to 42 damage, which is
not that much.
Oh, do not try out your AE spells near guards, they really don't like it
:)

Ramagh.
